OpenSim::MaterialManager

MaterialManager Class Reference

#include <MaterialManager.h>

Inheritance diagram for MaterialManager:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A class for representing the list of Materials in a model It maintains a list (eventually a hashTable between names and Materials).

Author:
Ayman Habib
Version:
1.0
